alert.note: Alert for Ballard (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 12:48PM EST until January 15 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo. .Recent heavy rainfall and snow melt will continue to keep water levels on the lower Ohio River in or near minor flood this week. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam, Cairo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 38.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday morning and continue falling. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
